title.rendered: Cambridge Audio Melomania 1+ True Wireless Earbuds – Bluetooth 5.0, Hi-Fi Sound, In Ear Headphones for iPhone and…

content.rendered:
Great British Sound

The newest true wi-fi expertise meets 50 years of Great British Sound experience in Cambridge Audio’s in ear headphones. 5.8mm Graphene-enhanced drivers, a novel High Performance Audio Mode and assist for the most recent aptX and AAC codecs, these earphones ship the immersive audio high quality you’ve come to count on from Cambridge Audio.

Ground-Breaking High Performance Audio Mode

Experience the improved true wi-fi sound of top-of-the-line wi-fi earbuds round. Melomania 1+ makes use of hello-fi grade amplification expertise to ship our greatest high quality sound expertise in a True Wireless Earbud. This means you get pleasure from a good larger soundstage, decrease noise and the next dynamic vary than ever earlier than.

Your signature sound

Tailor your EQ settings to fit your musical style with the free Melomania app for iPhone and Android gadgets.

Read more

Find Your Earbuds

With no wires to contend with, the Cambridge Audio Melomania 1+ earbuds are supposed to be worn on the go. Lost your wi-fi earbuds? The Find Your Earbuds function lets you observe them to the final place they had been linked.

Your Music. For Longer

With as much as 9 hours steady earbud playback and an unbelievable 45 hours between prices, Melomania 1+ ensures that your music is available whenever you need it, for so long as you need it. The wi-fi earbuds’ helpful charging case additionally carries a powerful additional 36 hours of playback, so that you’ll by no means be caught brief.

Make a splash

Make a splash with these true wi-fi earbuds. IPX5 water-resistant earbuds – protected to outlive a sudden rain bathe, or a visit to the gymnasium.

Read more

Noise isolating

Melomania 1+ earbuds are designed to ship an awesome ear match that ensures each consolation and improved sound high quality. A decent seal successfully isolates background noise, so you may get pleasure from extra of the music you like, with out having to pump up the quantity.

Intuitive Controls

Intuitive push button controls will let you Pause, Play, Skip tracks, Answer calls, and change Volume with ease

Mics for voice calls

Seamlessly take calls out of your telephone whereas remaining linked to your gadget with the Cambridge Audio in ear earbuds. Two microphones, alongside the most recent model of Qualcomm’s Clear Voice Capture (CVC) will let you use these wi-fi earphones for calls and conferences.

Read more

Designed and Engineered within the UK

For the final 50 years, we’ve labored laborious to ship merchandise that assist you to listen to your music at it’s perfect – with nothing added, nothing taken away. Designed and engineered in London, by the identical staff accountable for our award-profitable Hi-Fi, Melomania 1+ are not any exception. Immerse your self in excessive-high quality audio, with out the trouble of wires, wherever you’re.

Melomania 1+ Melomania Touch Melomania 1
Driver Type 5.8mm Graphene-enhanced 7mm Graphene-enhanced 5.8mm Graphene-enhanced
Battery Life Up to 45 hrs (9+36) Up to 50 hrs (9+41) Up to 45 hrs (9+36)
Charging USB-C USB-C Micro-USB
Digital Assistant Support ✓ ✓ ✓
True Wireless Stereo Plus ✓ ✓ ✓
Melomania App ✓ ✓ –
High Performance Audio Mode ✓ ✓ –
Transparency Mode – ✓ –
Firmware Upgradeable ✓ ✓ –
Find my Earbuds (on map) ✓ ✓ –

What’s within the field?

2 x Earbuds

1 x Charging case

1 x USB-A to USB-C charging cable

4 x Small Silicone suggestions

4 x Medium Silicone suggestions (2 x on buds)

4 x Large Silicone suggestions

4 x Medium Memory Foam suggestions

4 x Large Memory Foam suggestions

Make certain this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
MELOMANIA APP COMPATIBLE – Customise EQ, High Performance Audio Mode, Find my earbuds, Upgrade firmware and extra.
HIGH PERFORMANCE AUDIO MODE – Enjoy a good larger soundstage, decrease noise and the next dynamic vary than ever earlier than.
LONG BATTERY LIFE: Wireless earbuds as much as 9 hours playback with an additional 36 hours within the charging case . Spend extra time with your favorite artists
COMFORTABLE BLUETOOTH EARBUDS: Improved Comfort – Just 4.6g per earbud with an even bigger number of premium reminiscence foam and silicone suggestions now included.
SUPERIOR SOUND QUALITY: Great British Sound on the transfer – 50 years of audio experience in each pair of wi-fi bluetooth earbuds.
